Hi, this is
TWRP Builder

Which means no more TWRPless devices!

TWRP Builder is a project aiming creating Team Win Recovery Project (TWRP) for the devices not having their own TWRP support yet. Thanks to this project, any device can get the support! Besides, creating request is not something hard. Just download the app, create an account, upload the neccessary files from your device and stay tuned! Once we get the TWRP recovery image ready for your device, you will be notified!

Introduction?

We work with GitHub

Everything we do is available on GitHub. If you are curious about what we do, you can examine our project on GitHub.

GitHub

Feel free to ask on XDA Forum

We are everytime trying to help you as much as we can. Our forum thread is one of the available places where you can get help.

See our thread

Download our latest app

Latest is everytime the best! Do not look somewhere else to find it. It is right here!

Download!
